articles.title: Icardi so happy at PSG he’s thinking about a permanent move
articles.description: Things are going so well for Mauro Icardi at Paris Saint-Germain that he’s already thinking about staying next season
articles.content:
PSG has the option to make the loan deal permanent and Icardi, playing his part in a rampant attack which has scored 29 goals in the past six matches, appears to welcome a long-term move.
